main event: A UFO was observed by multiple witnesses at Carswell AFB, Texas on July 29, 1965.
interesting points: The UFO flew directly through the Carswell AFB control zone at a low altitude without position lights showing.
The UFO had at least three brilliant flashing white lights and was observed to fly at a constant rate and altitude without evidence of conventional means of propulsion.
The UFO was completely silent in flight.

The witness, a command pilot with a top secret clearance, considered the sighting to be a positive observation of a definite object of an unconventional nature, possibly of foreign origin, which could be a threat to national security.
The sighting was verified by three other persons on duty, including the sergeant, at the Carswell AFB control tower.
sighted object: a large, manta ray-shaped object with three flashing white lights
witnesses: a command pilot and his wife, as well as three other personnel at the Carswell AFB control tower
